0.description: Pure white — used in light mode surfaces

primary.value: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif
primary.description: Primary UI font stack. Swap for Inter when available.

mono.description: Monospace stack for code, token names, paths

sm.description: Body default, buttons, form labels, code

default.description: Accent highlight — metric emphasis, inline marks

text.description: Text on accent background (dark on cyan)

scrim.description: Modal backdrop scrim — apply at 60% opacity

scrim-heavy.description: Heavy scrim — fullscreen modal, lightbox — apply at 80% opacity

onBold.description: Text on warning bold background (dark text)

base-light.description: Main page background — darkest layer [light mode]

inverse-light.description: Light surface for inverted contexts [light mode]
Text on light / inverted surfaces [light mode]

on-brand-light.description: Text on brand.500 (primary CTA bg) [light mode]

on-status-light.description: Text on bold status backgrounds [light mode]
